---
title: Cell Options
---

Cell-level eval options:

```{julia}
a = 1
```

```{julia}
#| eval: false
a = 2
```

```{julia}
#| eval: true
a
```

Frontmatter-level eval: false with cell overrides:

```{julia}
#| eval: false
println("shouldn't run")
```

```{julia}
#| eval: true
println("should run")
```
